transcript:
Customer: mere paas call aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello ha shailendra ji good afternoon.
Customer: Ji good afternoon Ashraf baat kar raha hun sir number abhi koi dusra a gaya na maine bola unko ki sahi se baat nahi ho pa rahi to number change kar diya unhone mera official number.
Executive: Achcha lekin mujhe lagta hai number kisi aur ka number dikha raha hai.
Customer: Sir sunaun sir abhi jo backend team ko maine concern raise kiya ki main apne client se baat kar raha hun to call drop ho ja rahi hai.
Customer: To usne bola ki abhi main aapka jo number change kar raha hun official dekhiyega isse ho sakta hai ispe bhi drop kare mujhe to aisa lag raha hai.
Executive: Ye bhi jio ka hi hai.
Customer: Ye pata nahi inka kaun sa rehta hai jio ka rehta hai ki kiska rehta hai ye log number apne aap assign karte hain India mart wale.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Jaise kya hota hai na mera to chalo jo number hai wo to personal number se to maine aapko messages kare hi hain whatsapp pe.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hello message lekin jab main call ha jo message aate the wo to mera personal number tha whatsapp ka.
Customer: 7 wala aapka number na7100 ha 80 aapka jo 95 ha ha ye mera personal number hai ab ye na abhi ek feedback aapka open hai wo close karunga na to fir direct call jane lagegi mere number se abhi kya hai aapki wo feedback hai na video meeting ka request ka wo jab close kar dunga fir direct call jane lagegi aapke mere number se abhi aapka number check kar le raha hun theek hai.
Executive: Bilkul aap kar lijiye bilkul aap kar lijiye Ashraf of India mart karke.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir waise buyer ki call all miss ho rahi hai aapke pass to kya kuch problem aa rahi hai PNS calls mein.
Customer: Ha wo kuch time ka issue ho jata hai jaise be time call aati hai na.
Executive: Be time call aati hai na to be time wala na aap sahi kar sakte ho hamare pass ek option hai ki office hours mein aaye call.
Customer: Nahi to jo agar man chaliye aise time mein call kar rahe hain to fir humko nahi pata chalega na.
Executive: Ha ye baat bhi hai matlab.
Customer: Kyunki hum dekhte hain koi agar raat ko bhi laga dete hain phone theek hai na.
Executive: Ha sir.
Customer: 8 baje 10 baje us time available nahi rehte hain.
Executive: Laga dete hain.
Customer: Sahi baat hai jaise number mil jata hai aapko to kam se kam number mil jata hai to hum usko return call kar dete hain.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Customer: Nahi to fir wo to call aayega hi nahi fir.
Executive: Theek hai sir lekin jaise ki aap waha pe ek employee ho.
Customer: Hmm theek hai agar aap chaho to aap apna number sirf office hours pe rakh sakte ho.
Executive: Nahi wo to agar nahi theek hai theek hai wo idea aapko hai na theek hai sir fir koi problem nahi hai aap apne body ye aapka matter hai ki official mein rakhna ki un official mein.
Customer: Ha ha ha to main yaha ka employee hun aur apne ghar ka company hai matlab apne ghar jaisa hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha ha to koi problem nahi hai sir to apne ko sab kuch dekh ke chalna hai.
Customer: Sahi hai sir badhiya achi baat hai bhaiya ka bhi number dala hai ha bhaiya ka bhi dala hai to actually kya wo log busy rehte hain wo log nahi utha pate hain un official time mein.
Executive: Ha aur kya wo log nahi itna fir dekh.
Customer: Ha sir aur bhi to business hai ha aur bhi kam rehte hain kabhi driving kar rahe hain kabhi market mein hai kabhi kahin hai.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Customer: To wo calling jo hai mere ko uthana padta hai proper to kabhi kabhi mere se hi miss ho jati hai wo sochte hain ki main utha lunga lekin main kahin busy hun un official time mein kahin market mein hun ya ki kahin.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Customer: Is vajah se thoda sa miss bhi ho jata hai to ye hai ki number mil jata hai to hum usko return call kar lete hain.
Executive: Call kar lete hain sahi hai.
Customer: Agar bata denge waha se to dikkat ho jayegi.
Executive: Nahi nahi theek hai sir aise hi rehne dete hain achcha ek lead aayi thi sir slip form contractor ki abhi abhi lead wale mein lead section mein dekh pa rahe hain kya.
Customer: Lead manager ha lead by leads mein jahan se by lead consume karte hain.
Executive: Ek minute sir main open kar lun ji.
Customer: Kya naam se tha sir slip form contractor karke aaya hoga lead.
Executive: Nahi abhi dikha raha india mein recent pe lagaiye na sir india mein upar select kariye india aur fir recent pe click kariye.
Customer: Achcha india recent slip form contractor.
Executive: Ye kya hai shuttering plate mein kuch kam karna hoga iska folding planks and plates ka hoga.
Customer: Folding ye to ye to customer ka naam ho gaya na upar nahi nahi nahi abhi to customer ka naam hai hi nahi sir isme abhi jab contact buyer now karenge na tab fir buyer ki details isme se niklegi aapke liye.
Customer: Achcha to ye slip form contractor dal diya hai but aise to koi material rehta nahi hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi chod dete hain na sir chod dete hain use.
Customer: Kyunki is tarah se hum by agar consume karenge to fir usi type ka aayega usi type ki lead aayegi bilkul sahi baat hai ko banana padega.
Executive: Sahi baat hai sahi baat hai.
Customer: Aise karke double double do teen product ho jate hain iska aur usme agar pura fill up nahi karenge to fir wo less score dikhate jo hamare kuch aise product hai na jo less score dikha raha hai wo usi vajah se.
Executive: Ha hai achcha sir jaise aapne video meeting request dali thi to usme kya jankari aapko chahiye thi basically to sir waha se start karte hain hum log.
Customer: Jaise business kam aa raha hai ya business ko aur kaise badhaya jaye.
Executive: Hmm hmm main hamara requirement tha aaj ke purpose call karne ka jaise humne man chaliye ki humne isme se working kar rahe hain theek hai na handle kar rahe hain.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai sir ek proper tarike se kaise isko handle karna hai india mart ko pehla point theek hai na dusra point jaise humko se usme bata rahe the madam ko call aaya tha ki jo 26 din mein pura present dikhate hain.
Executive: Ha to waha pura matlab pura 30 din waha nahi show hota online hum nahi dikh pa rahe hain lekin open karke hum by purchase karte hain kis kya miss ho raha hai ki hum waha pura 26 din se apna performance dekhte hain na pura full report mein ha performance report aata hai sir bilkul ha to waha se hum dekhne ja rahe hain agar full report mein theek hai to usme se monthly karte hain to kisi mein dikhata hai jaise by lead ka hum dekhe theek hai na by lead mein dikha raha ki isme kis
summary:
Concerns:

- Call drops while talking to clients.

- Number showing someone else's number.

- Buyer's calls are being missed.

- Wants to know how to handle IndiaMART properly.

- Unable to see full 30 days performance report.



Resolution:

- Executive changed the customer's official number.

- Suggested setting office hours for calls.

- Executive checked the customer's number.

- Executive explained how to find buyer details.

- Discussed video meeting request and required information.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call drops, number change, pns calls, lead, video meeting, performance report
